title: Is the NFT Wind Coming Back? NFT Platform OpenSea Reaches Its Last 2-Year High in Transaction Volume! Here Are the Details
body: Leading NFT marketplace OpenSea saw its highest number of active users since mid-2023 last month, but trading volume remains well below previous market peaks. OpenSea Reaches Highest Number of Users Since 2023 According to Dune Analytics data, 467,322 users performed at least one transaction on OpenSea in May, similar to the platform’s peak period in mid-2022 – early 2023. June has already reached over 236,000 active users, suggesting continued momentum. However, trading volume is still far from the record levels of 2021 and early 2022. In May 2025, OpenSea recorded monthly trading volume of $81 million, well below the record volume of over $5 billion in January 2022. The increase in the number of active users is largely attributed to the official release of OpenSea’s new version, OS2, on May 29. The beta period was open only to Gemesis NFT holders (a collection of 94,757 NFTs mined in April 2023) and focused on testing the platform’s new features. The beta phase of OS2 started on January 27, 2025, and is now fully operational. With the new release, OpenSea users can now trade NFTs and tokens on 19 different blockchains, including Solana’s fungible tokens. The platform also announced a new rewards system called Voyages, which allows users to earn XP (experience points) based on their on-chain activities. Alongside these developments, there is also anticipation within the community of a possible airdrop of OpenSea’s native token, SEA. However, no official date has been announced yet. “I know you’re all asking ‘when is the TGE?’ (when will the token be released?),” said Adam Hollander, OpenSea CMO, “But we have a lot of surprises ahead of us, new launches and innovations. It’s very important to get these structures in place before we launch the token.” Although OpenSea's revival of its user base in this new era is noteworthy, it seems that the NFT market still needs time to bring its overall transaction volume back to previous levels. *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: Is the NFT Wind Coming Back? NFT Platform OpenSea Reaches Its Last 2-Year High in Transaction Volume! Here Are the Details

title: Upbit Announces Important Temporary Suspension of SEI Services
body: BitcoinWorld Upbit Announces Important Temporary Suspension of SEI Services Attention, cryptocurrency traders and SEI holders! A significant announcement has come from one of South Korea’s major digital asset platforms. Upbit , a leading crypto exchange , has confirmed a temporary halt to certain operations involving the SEI token. This move is directly related to upcoming network enhancements for SEI . What Exactly is Happening with the Upbit SEI Suspension ? According to an official notice posted on its website, Upbit will be temporarily suspending deposits and withdrawals of the SEI token. This isn’t a permanent measure, but a necessary step to accommodate a scheduled network upgrade for SEI . The suspension is set to begin promptly at 09:00 UTC on June 10 . Here are the key details you need to know: Affected Token: SEI Exchange: Upbit Action: Temporary suspension of deposits and withdrawals Start Date/Time: June 10, 2024, at 09:00 UTC Reason: To support the upcoming SEI network upgrade It’s crucial to understand that while deposits and withdrawals are paused, trading of SEI pairs on Upbit is typically unaffected by such suspensions unless specifically stated otherwise in the announcement. However, users planning to move their SEI tokens onto or off the exchange around this date need to be aware of this scheduled downtime. Why is the SEI Network Upgrade Necessary? Network upgrades are a common and vital part of the lifecycle for many blockchain projects, including SEI . Think of it like software updates for your computer or phone – they are implemented to improve performance, enhance security features, fix bugs, or introduce new functionalities. For a blockchain network like SEI , an upgrade can involve significant changes to the underlying protocol. Reasons for a SEI network upgrade could include: Implementing new consensus mechanism improvements. Enhancing transaction speed or efficiency. Adding support for new features or smart contract capabilities. Strengthening network security against potential threats. Optimizing network performance and scalability. For a crypto exchange like Upbit , supporting such an upgrade involves ensuring their systems are compatible with the updated network. If they continued processing deposits and withdrawals during the upgrade, there could be risks of transactions being lost, incorrectly processed, or tokens being incompatible with the updated chain. Suspending services is a precautionary measure to protect user funds and maintain the integrity of the exchange’s operations with the SEI network. What Does This Mean for SEI Holders on Upbit ? If you hold SEI on Upbit and have no immediate plans to deposit or withdraw, this announcement might have minimal direct impact on your current holdings. Your tokens remain safely stored on the exchange. However, if you were planning to transfer SEI to or from your Upbit account around June 10th, you will need to adjust your plans. Any deposit initiated after the suspension begins may not be credited until the suspension is lifted, and withdrawal requests will likely be blocked. It’s important to note that the duration of the suspension is temporary. Upbit will typically monitor the SEI network upgrade progress and will resume deposit and withdrawal services once they are confident that the network is stable and their systems are fully compatible with the upgraded chain. They will issue a follow-up announcement when services are restored. Understanding the Role of a Crypto Exchange in Upgrades Major crypto exchange platforms like Upbit play a crucial role in the ecosystem. They act as gateways for users to buy, sell, and store digital assets. When a blockchain network undergoes a significant upgrade, exchanges must coordinate their activities to ensure a smooth transition. Their responsibilities during a network upgrade often include: Monitoring: Keeping a close watch on the upgrade process on the blockchain network. Preparation: Updating their node software and internal systems to be compatible with the new version of the network. Communication: Informing users about the upcoming changes and any service disruptions, such as the Upbit SEI suspension . User Fund Safety: Implementing temporary halts on deposits/withdrawals to prevent loss or errors during the transition. Post-Upgrade Verification: Thoroughly testing deposit and withdrawal functions after the upgrade is complete before resuming services. This proactive approach by exchanges helps maintain trust and security within the cryptocurrency space. The Upbit SEI suspension is a standard procedure designed with user protection in mind. Navigating the Upbit Suspension: Actionable Steps For SEI users on Upbit , the best course of action is to stay informed and plan ahead. Here are some tips: Check Official Sources: Always refer to the official Upbit website or announcement channels for the most accurate and up-to-date information regarding the Upbit SEI suspension and its resumption. Plan Transfers: If you need to deposit or withdraw SEI around June 10th, try to complete these transactions well before the 09:00 UTC deadline. Set Reminders: Note the date and time of the suspension to avoid attempting transfers during the downtime. Be Patient: Understand that the suspension is temporary. Wait for Upbit to officially announce the resumption of services before attempting deposits or withdrawals again. Consider Alternatives (if necessary): If you absolutely must move SEI during the suspension period, you would need to explore other exchanges or wallets that might not be undergoing maintenance simultaneously, but this requires careful research and consideration. The SEI network upgrade is a positive sign for the project’s development, and the temporary suspension by Upbit is a standard operational procedure to ensure a smooth transition for users. Conclusion Upbit has announced a temporary halt to SEI deposits and withdrawals starting June 10th at 09:00 UTC. This measure is being taken to facilitate the upcoming SEI network upgrade . While this Upbit SEI suspension means users cannot move their SEI tokens onto or off the platform during this period, it is a necessary step undertaken by the crypto exchange to ensure the safety of user funds and compatibility with the updated network. Users are advised to plan their transactions accordingly and monitor official Upbit channels for updates on when services will be fully restored. This is a routine event in the crypto world, highlighting the ongoing development and maintenance required for blockchain networks. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping digital assets price action. This post Upbit Announces Important Temporary Suspension of SEI Services first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: BitMEX Launches June Jumpstart Trading Competition with a 3 BTC Prize Pool
body: June 9th, 2025 – Mahe, Seychelles BitMEX , the safest crypto exchange, announced today the launch of its June Jumpstart Trading Competition , allowing traders to compete for their share of a 3 BTC prize pool. The competition will run from June 6, 2025, at 11:00 AM (UTC) to June 30, 2025, at 11:59 PM (UTC). Users can participate in the competition anytime during the campaign period. Rewards will be distributed across three leaderboards: Highest Trading Volume: 80% of the total prize pool will be shared by the Top 100 Traders ranked by trading volume Highest PnL: 10% of the total prize pool will be shared by the Top 100 Traders ranked by PnL Highest ROI%: 10% of the total prize pool will be shared by the Top 100 Traders ranked by ROI% All new traders who join the competition also have the opportunity to win their share of an additional 10,000 USDT prize pool based on their trading volume. To participate in the June Jumpstart Trading Competition, new customers must be fully verified on BitMEX. Competition details and registration can be found here . About BitMEX BitMEX is the OG crypto derivatives exchange, providing professional crypto traders with a platform that caters to their needs through low latency, deep crypto native liquidity, and unmatched reliability. title: 4 Best Cryptos to Buy Now: BlockDAG, Cosmos, SUI & SEI!
body: Breaking into the public spotlight is tough, but a few projects are doing it smartly in 2025. Some are focusing on real use cases and tech features, while others are building media appeal. Its confirmed sponsorship with Inter Milan and a hinted NBA tie-up show that BlockDAG’s aim is much bigger than basic crypto promotions. These moves aren’t just for name recognition, they’re designed to reach wider audiences outside traditional crypto platforms. Among the best cryptos to buy now, BlockDAG is one of the few balancing tech growth with cultural engagement. 1. The Inter Milan partnership was a bold start, signaling a focus beyond crypto circles. Now, with hints of a future NBA connection, BlockDAG is reaching sports fans worldwide. This approach taps into two huge global audiences, giving BDAG more exposure than standard digital ads ever could. The crossover between sports fans and crypto users is strong. Both groups are tech-aware, social media-active, and quick to pick up trends. That’s why these sports deals aren’t just marketing, they show that BlockDAG is here to stay. These partnerships act as endorsements, helping BDAG gain support from both everyday users and major players in the space. The figures also back up the buzz. Plus, over 1.5 million people are now using the X1 mining app. BlockDAG is doing more than just catching eyes, it’s building proof. 2. Cosmos (ATOM): Bridging Blockchains Seamlessly Cosmos remains one of the best cryptos to buy now due to its focus on connecting different blockchains. Its IBC protocol lets separate systems communicate smoothly, which is important as the need for multi-chain setups increases. Cosmos might not be doing sports deals like BlockDAG, but its technology is recognized in developer circles. Even without flashy partnerships, Cosmos maintains visibility through events, news, and technical updates. The brand remains consistent, focusing on a stable and scalable structure. That appeals to those building in the crypto space. Cosmos stays dependable by sticking to its original goal and improving what matters. 3. Sui (SUI): Powering Gaming & Finance SUI is winning attention with its speed and smooth user experience. Developed by a team from Meta, SUI started with high expectations and continues to impress. Its model for running many transactions at once makes it suitable for fast-paced platforms like games and finance apps. Rather than going for mass media attention, SUI builds its name through tech updates and trusted partnerships. Collaborations with metaverse and NFT projects gave it a push after launch. Though not as visible in mainstream circles as BlockDAG, SUI proves itself with real use and transparent progress. It’s one of the best cryptos to buy now for users who value function and trust. 4. SEI Network (SEI): Facilitating High-Speed Transactions SEI is gaining ground by fine-tuning its blockchain for high-speed trades. As a Layer 1 system built for DeFi, it focuses on fast action and low delays. It uses tools like order books that are key for crypto exchanges and serious trading apps. When it comes to getting attention, SEI chooses depth over flash. Its name is spreading thanks to technical performance, solid partnerships, and continued updates. Unlike BlockDAG’s wide media appeal, SEI earns its place through usefulness and community respect. It may not reach pop culture, but it holds a strong spot in crypto-focused spaces. Final Thoughts! In today’s race for visibility, smart promotion is a major edge. Cosmos, SUI, and SEI have built strong positions with solid performance and steady growth. But BlockDAG is doing something different, showing that when you mix strong features with smart media, you get wider impact. The Inter Milan move showed ambition. The NBA teaser proved follow-through. With $291 million raised, over 22.1 billion coins sold, and a chance to grab BDAG at $0.0018, BlockDAG clearly stands out among the best cryptos to buy now . title: OpenSea active addresses spike to new high after OS2 launch
body: OpenSea has seen a surge in active addresses following the release of OS2 from its testing phase. The number rose to levels previously only seen in early 2023, however its trading volume has remained low. According to data from Dune Analytics, the platform saw a 44% increase in its monthly active addresses compared to the previous month. In May 2025, the NFT marketplace saw 467,322 users who made one or more transactions. The last time the platform reached that many users was back in April 2023. In fact, June is already showing a similar pattern, with its current number already standing at 236,091 active users. The sudden surge in users could be attributed to the marketplace’s recent major update, OS2. Launched in May 2025, the platform upgrade enables traders to trading in both fungible and non-fungible tokens. Not only that, the upgrade also removes the need to bridge or swap tokens. You might also like: Yuga Labs CEO wants to ‘kill the ApeCoin DAO’ and launch a new entity Despite the jump in active addresses, the data shows that it has barely made a difference to the platform’s trading volume. According to Dune analytics, OpenSea’s monthly trading volume for May is still at $81 million, only jumping by $21 million from the previous month’s $60 million trading volume. The number remains far below the platform’s previous highs back in $5 billion back in early 2022. Even in June, the trading volume has not seen signs of a revival, considering it has barely managed to reflect the active address increase. As of June 6, the trading volume stands at $24 million. Ever since the NFT market began declining in 2022, many traders have begun to question whether NFTs are still relevant. Major NFT firms like Yuga Labs has chosen to sell their staple NFT brands, such as CryptoPunks and Moonbirds to other firms. Initially, OpenSea hoped the OS2 update would boost NFT trading on the marketplace, reviving the NFT trade. However at press time, it has not shown signs of definite success yet. Read more: OpenSea revamp: Can OS2 set the stage for a potential comeback?

title: Apple claims AI reasoning models 'collapse' and quit easily as  Tim Cook faces WWDC without a new product
body: Apple heads into its annual Worldwide Developers Conference (WWDC) beginning Monday with little to no progress in artificial intelligence, with struggles to meet expectations set by its tech rivals. Yet, the iPhone manufacturer claims that large language models are “failing” because they are focused more on benchmarks than solving problems. Over the weekend, a research paper circulated on social media from Apple’s AI research division that “downplayed” the capabilities of reasoning models developed by OpenAI, Google DeepMind, Anthropic, and DeepSeek. According to the paper , these models have declined in accuracy against the backdrop of an increase in task complexity, ultimately reaching a “point of complete failure.” “Existing evaluations predominantly focus on established mathematical and coding benchmarks, which, while valuable, often suffer from data contamination issues and do not allow for controlled experimental conditions across different settings and complexities. These evaluations do not provide insights into the structure and quality of reasoning traces ,” it read. AI is failing when problems are harder Using custom-designed puzzles with controlled levels of complexity, Apple researchers observed that large AI models failed to keep up performances and exerted less effort as problems grew harder. The analysts, who measured the reduction by fewer inference-time tokens used during response generation, called the AI situation a “collapse.” The models tested included OpenAI’s o3-mini variant and Anthropic’s Claude 3.7 Sonnet. The o3-mini models performed “poorly,” while Claude models were slightly resilient. Even when provided with the correct algorithm for solving the Tower of Hanoi puzzle, the models did not improve their performance. Apple’s researchers concluded that these AI systems may not be as advanced in reasoning as commonly assumed.. WWDC kicks off pending any product announcement buzz In previous WWDC events, Apple used the conference to unveil new products, like the Vision Pro headset in 2022 and its Apple Intelligence initiative in 2023. In this year’s conference, market watchers are convinced there is nothing to look forward to. Bloomberg has previewed the WWDC schedule , coining the updates as “underwhelming.” Moreover, much of what Apple revealed last year is still unavailable to users. The publication explained that Apple’s AI announcements this week would likely be minor and insufficient to impress an industry now led by Google, Meta, OpenAI, and other AI-first firms. Apple’s stock has dropped over 18% in 2025, and CEO Tim Cook has been blasted about the company’s new products and AI integration pipeline. Gene Munster, managing partner at Deepwater Asset Management, told CNN earlier this year that “it’s becoming clearer how far behind Apple are in AI.” Dan Ives of Wedbush Securities estimates that 25% of the global population could eventually access AI through Apple devices, but as of now, that “potential is unrealized.” In its earnings call last month, CEO Tim Cook admitted that there were delays in rolling out improved AI features such as a more personal version of Siri. “ We need more time to complete our work on these features so they meet our high quality bar ,” Cook said. “ We are making progress, and we look forward to getting these features into customers’ hands. ” Meanwhile, Apple’s competitors are dipping into the tech giant’s clientele, looking to steal loyalists who have been expecting Cook’s team to deliver something “better.” Samsung is reportedly partnering with AI startup Perplexity to integrate AI-enhanced digital assistants into upcoming Galaxy phones. Motorola’s new Razr also includes Perplexity-powered features, among other AI integrations. Apple’s delay in launching AI-powered experiences in its ecosystem puts it at risk of falling behind in a market it once dominated. Cryptopolitan Academy: Want to grow your money in 2025? Learn how to do it with DeFi in our upcoming webclass. Save Your Spot

title: This stock rallies over 200% on Bitcoin-led buyout of parent company
body: Know Labs (NYSE: KNW), a little-known healthcare stock, has skyrocketed over 200% following an interesting acquisition of its parent company, mainly funded through Bitcoin ( BTC ). The medical device company closed Friday’s session up 205% at $1.56 and is now up 213% over the past week. That momentum hasn’t slowed, with shares soaring another 100% in Monday’s pre-market trading to $3.13. KNW one-day stock price chart. Source: Google Finance The rally is fueling the announcement that Goldeneye 1995 LLC, an investment vehicle tied to Greg Kidd, former chief risk officer at Ripple, is acquiring a controlling stake in Know Labs using 1,000 Bitcoin and additional cash. At current prices, the Bitcoin component alone is worth over $105 million. Particulars of Know Labs acquisition Under the terms of the deal, Goldeneye will purchase common stock by dividing the total value of the 1,000 Bitcoin by Know Labs’ share price at the time of the agreement—$0.335. This structure significantly increases Goldeneye’s equity stake in the company. At the same time, Know Labs plans to retain Bitcoin as part of its treasury reserves, exposing investors to the digital currency . Once the acquisition is finalized, Kidd will take over as CEO and also assume the role of chairman of the board. “I’m thrilled to deploy a Bitcoin treasury strategy with the support of a forward-looking organization like Know Labs at a time when market and regulatory conditions are particularly favorable. We believe this approach will generate sustainable growth and long-term shareholder value,” Kidd said. Notably, the Seattle-based company specializes in noninvasive health monitoring technology . Its flagship product in development, KnowU, is a wearable, continuous glucose monitor that helps people with diabetes manage their blood sugar without needles. The device can be worn on the wrist, forearm, or as an adhesive patch with a removable sensor, offering a discreet and convenient alternative to traditional glucose testing. Featured image via Shutterstock The post This stock rallies over 200% on Bitcoin-led buyout of parent company appeared first on Finbold .

title: Urgent: Binance Announces Stratis (STRAX) Deposit & Withdrawal Suspension for Crucial Upgrade
body: BitcoinWorld Urgent: Binance Announces Stratis (STRAX) Deposit & Withdrawal Suspension for Crucial Upgrade Attention, cryptocurrency traders and holders! If you’re dealing with Stratis (STRAX) on Binance, there’s an important announcement you need to be aware of. The global crypto exchange giant, Binance, has informed its users about a temporary halt on Binance Stratis suspension activities. According to an official notice posted on their website, Binance will be suspending deposits and withdrawals for tokens operating on the Stratis (STRAX) network. This temporary measure is scheduled to begin on June 11, 2024, at 10:00 AM UTC. The reason behind this planned downtime is to support the upcoming STRAX network upgrade and hard fork. Why is This Binance Stratis Suspension Happening? Network upgrades and hard forks are significant events in the life of a blockchain. They are often implemented to introduce new features, improve performance, enhance security, or fix existing issues. In the case of the Stratis hard fork , it signifies a substantial change to the network’s protocol that is not backward-compatible with older versions. For a major exchange like Binance, supporting such an event involves a careful process. They need to ensure that their systems are compatible with the new network rules after the hard fork occurs. Suspending Binance STRAX deposits and withdrawals is a standard procedure to prevent potential issues that could arise from transactions being initiated on the old network version while the new one is being implemented or immediately afterward. This safeguards user funds and ensures a smooth transition once the upgrade is complete. What Does This Mean for STRAX Holders on Binance? If you currently hold STRAX tokens in your Binance account, generally, you don’t need to take any immediate action regarding the upgrade itself. Binance typically handles all the technical requirements for users holding tokens on the exchange during standard network upgrades and hard forks that don’t involve a token swap. However, the suspension of crypto deposit withdrawal services for STRAX means you will not be able to move your Stratis tokens onto or off the exchange during the specified period. This is the key actionable insight for users: If you need to deposit STRAX to Binance, make sure it arrives before the June 11, 10:00 AM UTC deadline. If you need to withdraw STRAX from Binance, complete the withdrawal before the same deadline. Transactions attempted after the suspension begins will likely be rejected or might not be credited properly once services resume, leading to potential loss of funds. Trading of STRAX on Binance is generally not affected by deposit and withdrawal suspensions related to network upgrades, unless explicitly stated otherwise by the exchange. Users can typically continue to trade STRAX pairs on the spot or derivatives markets as usual. Understanding Network Upgrades and Hard Forks To appreciate why this temporary Binance Stratis suspension is necessary, it helps to understand the underlying technology: Network Upgrade: This is a change to the blockchain’s protocol. It’s like updating the operating system of a computer network. Hard Fork: A type of network upgrade that creates a permanent divergence from the previous version of the blockchain. Nodes running the old software will not be able to validate blocks created by nodes running the new software. For the network to continue as a single chain, the majority of participants (especially miners/validators and exchanges) must adopt the new software. Why Suspension? During the transition period, there’s a risk of transactions being broadcast on the old chain or issues arising from the split. Exchanges suspend deposits/withdrawals to prevent users from losing funds by sending them to addresses that might become invalid or by having transactions stuck between the old and new chain versions. This specific STRAX network upgrade aims to bring improvements to the Stratis platform, potentially enhancing its capabilities for decentralized applications, smart contracts, or overall efficiency. The exact details of the upgrade would be available through Stratis’s official communication channels. When Will Services Resume? Binance’s announcement typically states that the suspension is temporary and in support of the upgrade. They will reopen Binance STRAX deposits and withdrawals once they are confident that the Stratis network is stable after the hard fork and their systems have been successfully updated and tested. The exact time for the resumption of services is usually announced separately after the upgrade is completed. Users should monitor Binance’s official announcements for updates on when they can resume their crypto deposit withdrawal activities for STRAX. Staying Informed is Key For any cryptocurrency user, especially those holding or trading altcoins like STRAX, staying informed about network developments and exchange announcements is crucial. Events like the Stratis hard fork and the subsequent Binance Stratis suspension can impact your ability to manage your assets. By paying attention to these notices, you can plan your deposits and withdrawals accordingly, avoiding potential inconvenience or loss of access to your funds during the upgrade period. Binance provides these notices well in advance to give users ample time to prepare. In Conclusion Binance’s temporary suspension of Stratis (STRAX) deposits and withdrawals on June 11, 2024, is a necessary step to support the upcoming STRAX network upgrade and hard fork. This action ensures the security and integrity of user funds during a significant protocol change on the Stratis blockchain. While it means a brief pause in your ability to move STRAX onto or off the exchange, it’s a standard procedure that ultimately benefits the network and its users by facilitating a smooth transition to an improved version of Stratis. Make sure to complete any necessary Binance STRAX deposits or withdrawals before the deadline and keep an eye on Binance’s official channels for the announcement of service resumption. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping crypto deposit withdrawal and institutional adoption. This post Urgent: Binance Announces Stratis (STRAX) Deposit & Withdrawal Suspension for Crucial Upgrade first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: Michael Saylor’s Strategy Buys $110 Million Worth of Bitcoin
body: Michael Saylor announced that Strategy has made yet another considerable Bitcoin buy, adding 1045 BTC to its stash. The company spent approximately $110.2 million at $105,426 per coin. Year-to-date, Strategy has achieved a BTC yield of 17.1% and as of yesterday, it holds 582,000 BTC acquired for $70,086 each, currently worth almost $41 billion. Strategy has acquired 1,045 BTC for ~$110.2 million at ~$105,426 per bitcoin and has achieved BTC Yield of 17.1% YTD 2025. As of 6/8/2025, we hodl 582,000 $BTC acquired for ~$40.79 billion at ~$70,086 per bitcoin. $MSTR $STRK $STRF $STRD https://t.co/9cpK5vtVwW — Michael Saylor (@saylor) June 9, 2025 The most recent purchase doesn’t really come as a surprise as the company has virtually created a BTC playbook for diversifying corporate treasuries with the leading digital asset. This move reaffirms Saylor’s growing positivity on the asset. Recall that he’s a firm believer that Bitcoin will reach a price of $1 million once Wall Street firms start allocating just 10% of their reserves into it. The post Michael Saylor’s Strategy Buys $110 Million Worth of Bitcoin appeared first on CryptoPotato .

title: Top Altcoins Picks for This Week: HYPE, BNB, SUI
body: The post Top Altcoins Picks for This Week: HYPE, BNB, SUI appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News In the cryptocurrency market , June is Q2’s last month, and many are having high hopes. Many are predicting that with rising optimistic factors for the market, soon the top crypto and altcoins are predicted to experience significant movement this week. Several altcoins are showing promising upside potential. Keep reading to know what our top choices are this week. Why This Week Is Bullish For Altcoins? Due to the Trump-Musk feud and ongoing tariff uncertainty, June was a mildly bearish week. But, the recent positive US jobs report and restart of US-China tariffs talks have given a slight charm from June 6th onwards, as a result, Bitcoin price has advanced nearly 5%. More to it, Russia-Ukraine chaos is driving safe-haven demand for Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies. The improved opinions have created high hopes in the sector. Even companies like Circle, one of the largest stablecoin issuers,is growing one step higher with recently raised $1.1 billion via an IPO , and Reuters recently highlighted that adoption could see a fast track with the UK to lift bans on crypto ETNs . Several factors boosted the sentiment, and now high standards have been raised further for the upcoming week in the crypto sector. Importantly, the upcoming U.S. consumer inflation data scheduled for Wednesday, June 11, 2025, will have an impact on BTC and most altcoins if it is only lower-than-expected. If it comes in favour, then the probability of reaching $112,000 or more could advance. A breakout could lift the broader market, including altcoins like Hyperliquid (HYPE), Binance Coin (BNB), and Sui (SUI). These three altcoins are to watch this weekend. Top Alt’s Prediction This Week – HYPE, BNB, SUI Hyperliquid token (HYPE) has gained 11% this week, and the momentum is expected to continue this week. The main reason for its growth was the recent listing on the Binance exchange. Now, if more optimistic factors join the market, then this week the HYPE price is set to surpass its ATH of $39.93 and could end the Q2 2025 beyond $50, with a symmetrical triangle breakout. Similarly, another altcoin is BNB, Binance’s native token, and Binance is one of the best-performing CEXs globally, despite being in an era of the toughest regulatory pressures. Its token BNB price is up 4% this week, currently selling on exchanges at $655. With a solid market cap of $92.21 billion and growing ecosystem demand, BNB price could close the week by surpassing the Q2 high of $697 and reach $700. Source: TradingView Moreover, SUI, which is known as high-speed blockchain, is our third pick for this week. The investors’ consistent market interest makes it an altcoin that could show a strong spike this week. title: Ethereum Price Analysis: Is $3K In Sight for ETH This Month?
body: Ethereum has recently faced a slight rejection at the 200-day moving average of $2.6K, showcasing sellers’ presence. Nevertheless, further consolidation and a deeper correction might be on the way for the cryptocurrency. ETH Price Analysis: Technicals By Shayan Markets The Daily Chart Ethereum has once again faced rejection at the critical 200-day moving average near $2.6K, reflecting persistent selling pressure and a lack of bullish momentum. This prolonged consolidation below the 200-day MA signals buyer exhaustion and increases the likelihood of a deeper correction. The price remains trapped between the 100-day MA at $2K and the 200-day MA at $2.6K, forming a mid-term range. Given the current weakness, a decline toward the range’s lower boundary appears plausible. However, if bulls manage to reclaim the 200-day MA, a rapid short-squeeze could propel the price toward the $3K resistance zone. Source: TradingView The 4-Hour Chart On the lower timeframe, Ethereum continues to oscillate within a rising wedge pattern, typically a bearish formation. The recent rejection from the upper boundary around $2.6K confirms seller dominance, with price now hovering near the wedge’s lower edge. A breakdown from this level would likely initiate a bearish continuation toward the $2.2K support area. Until a decisive breakout occurs, price action is expected to remain choppy within the wedge. Source: TradingView ETH Price: Sentiment Analysis By Shayan Markets Ethereum remains range-bound just below a key resistance level, leaving investors uncertain about the potential for an imminent bullish breakout. A critical metric to watch is the ETH Taker Buy-Sell Ratio, which tracks the dominance of aggressive market orders, those executed at the current market price, revealing whether buyers or sellers are driving momentum. These orders typically indicate urgency and conviction among traders. Lately, the 30-day moving average of this ratio has been trending downward, signalling a rise in aggressive selling. This shift points to growing bearish pressure, with profit-taking and distribution likely increasing as Ethereum struggles to overcome resistance. If this selling trend continues, it may lead to a deeper correction, with the $2,200 level emerging as a key support. However, if the recent selling is primarily driven by short-term traders or so-called “weak hands,” it could mark a healthy consolidation phase, potentially setting the stage for a renewed bullish breakout. In summary, Ethereum’s next major move will largely depend on whether the current selling pressure escalates or fades amid underlying mid-term demand. Source: CryptoQuant The post Ethereum Price Analysis: Is $3K In Sight for ETH This Month? appeared first on CryptoPotato .

title: SUI PRICE ANALYSIS & PREDICTION (June 9) – SUI Signals a Fresh Buy Following Latest Bounce, End of Correction?
body: Looking at the latest recovery in the market, SUI appears to have found support after witnessing a major correction for almost a month. It shows bullish signs, but there’s currently not enough volume in the market. Ending the month of May on a bearish note due to a broad correction across the crypto space, SUI started this month very weak and lost more ground. Surprisingly, the bulls reacted strongly to the bearish move and intercepted further drops above the $2.8 level during last week’s trading. Holding this level as temporal support, the price bounced back following a sudden increase in the demand level, and the crypto traded back above $3. Despite the bounce, it is important to note that the price is still under correction on the daily chart. Considering that, it is too early to say the bulls are back in action. But from a technical standpoint, they are much more likely to regain control anytime soon. A significant increase above the previous monthly high should bring them fully back into the market with a potential break-up. That said, the trading landscape has changed briefly over the past few days, and as we can see on the daily chart, it is showing signs of a shift on the daily chart. If the price slides back to support, a break there could cause more drawdowns before finding a solid rebound level. SUI Key Levels To Watch Source: Tradingview Pushing higher from the current trading level, it may climb back above the $3.75 and $4.25 resistance levels. A surge through these levels could bring a full recovery to $5 and $5.5. before exploding to a new high. The latest recovery is supported by the $2.83 level. A drop off this level could correct the price lower to $2.42 and potentially $2.02 in no time. Key Resistance Levels: $3.75, $4.25, $5 Key Support Levels: $2.83, $2.42, $2.02 Spot Price: $3.28 Trend: Bullish Volatility: Low Disclosure: This is not trading or investment advice. title: Nvidia CEO says support for the UK's AI talent is underwhelming
body: Nvidia Corp. CEO Jensen Huang said that the UK’s artificial intelligence talent is an “envy of the world. Huang noted that while the UK boasts world-class researchers and scientists, the absence of robust computing resources hinders the nation’s ability to lead in the AI sector. During a talk with UK Prime Minister Keir Starmer at the beginning of London Tech Week, Huang mentioned that the UK is in a Goldilocks situation . This means that it is a perfect time for AI companies to succeed. The CEO urged substantial investment in foundational infrastructure to support the growing AI ecosystem. He added that this is the biggest global AI ecosystem that lacks its own infrastructure. The UK embraces AI for economic growth and staying competitive For AI systems to operate smoothly, they need good data, strong hardware, safe systems, and ongoing checks and improvements. Setting clear goals, tackling possible biases, and encouraging flexibility to use AI successfully are also important. For instance, to power generative tools such as ChatGPT, AI models need an enormous amount of computing from massive data centers to build and process millions of queries from users around the globe. The data centers require abundant electricity , water, and other infrastructure. In recognition of this requirement, Starmer said on Monday , June 9, that his party would commit an extra £1 billion, worth $1.4 billion of funding. This will be used to scale up their computing power by a factor of 20 and increase infrastructure for building artificial intelligence in the UK. The UK’s Financial Conduct Authority also announced the same day that it is setting up a so-called regulatory sandbox to allow financial firms to experiment with AI using Nvidia’s technology. These sandboxes enable companies with new ideas at the crossroads between finance and technology to test products and services before fully launching them. Liquidity, a start-up lender, will also set up a European head office in London and has decided to invest £1.5 billion in companies over the next five years. Earlier, the government partnered with Nvidia to train more people in AI skills and expand research. All this effort ensures that the UK solidifies its position in the AI ecosystem as demand for AI skyrockets. According to data from reliable sources, today, over 70 countries have put AI strategies and policies in place that describe various ways to build a strong AI ecosystem. This variety of strategies is encouraging because it shows that many people understand how important AI will likely become for economic growth and staying competitive. UK still presents opportunity for AI despite lagging behind in the sector The US and China have been leading the way in reproducing groundbreaking generative AI companies. America is often seen as a leader in generative AI development, especially in the quality and abilities of its models. China has also made great progress in generative AI, with major companies like Baidu and Alibaba taking the lead. The way the US develops AI mainly depends on teamwork between companies and researchers using open-source resources. Companies in the US include Google, OpenAI, and Microsoft, which create advanced generative AI models. Meanwhile, China concentrates on generative AI for real-world applications, taking advantage of its big domestic market. Contrastingly, Europe has lagged behind. Europe still does not have anywhere near as much data center development as its rivals. Despite this, Huang is nursing hope in Europe. He acknowledged that what is really impressive and presents a great opportunity for the UK is that AI is not just a technology. Based on his argument, AI acts as infrastructure because it affects many industries simultaneously. Huang further stated that since this technology is extensive and transforms every sector, it will be viewed as a vital infrastructure, similar to electricity. The CEO is touring Europe this week. He hinted that many AI factories are being planned in the area. Huang is also expected to speak at Paris’s VivaTech and meet leaders in the UK, Germany, France, and Belgium this week. title: Bitcoin: Jump Crypto Executes Massive $105M Transfer to Galaxy Digital
body: BitcoinWorld Bitcoin: Jump Crypto Executes Massive $105M Transfer to Galaxy Digital The world of institutional cryptocurrency is constantly buzzing with activity, and large transfers between major players often signal underlying strategies or market positioning. A recent notable event caught the eye of market observers: a significant Bitcoin transfer involving two prominent firms, Jump Crypto and Galaxy Digital. Understanding the Jump Crypto and Galaxy Digital Transfer According to on-chain data shared by The Data Nerd on X, Jump Crypto , the digital asset arm of the renowned trading firm Jump Trading Group, recently transferred a substantial amount of Bitcoin to Galaxy Digital , the financial services and investment management firm founded by Mike Novogratz. Let’s break down the details: Approximately two hours prior to the report, 501 BTC were moved from a wallet associated with Jump Crypto to one linked to Galaxy Digital. At the time of the transfer, this 501 BTC was valued at roughly $53 million. This wasn’t an isolated event. Over the three days leading up to the report, Galaxy Digital had accumulated a total of 1,001 BTC from Jump Crypto. The cumulative value of these transfers over the three days amounted to approximately $105.32 million. This series of transactions highlights the active relationship and potential operational needs between these major institutional entities within the crypto ecosystem. Why Are These Institutional Bitcoin Transfers Significant? When large players like Jump Crypto and Galaxy Digital move substantial amounts of cryptocurrency, it’s rarely arbitrary. These movements can offer insights into their strategies, market outlook, or operational requirements. Tracking such on-chain activity is a key part of understanding the institutional landscape in crypto. Potential reasons behind large institutional Bitcoin transfer events include: Over-the-Counter (OTC) Trading: Firms often conduct large trades off public exchanges to minimize market impact. One party might transfer assets to another as part of a pre-arranged OTC deal. Custody Solutions: Galaxy Digital offers custody services. Jump Crypto might be moving assets into Galaxy’s custody for secure storage or management. Liquidity Management: Assets might be moved between wallets or entities for various liquidity needs, such as preparing for trading activities, meeting client demands, or rebalancing portfolios. Strategic Positioning: Accumulation or distribution of assets could signal a firm’s bullish or bearish stance, although a single transfer doesn’t provide the full picture. Internal Transfers: While less likely between two distinct major firms unless part of a partnership or service agreement, sometimes large movements are simply internal restructuring. Without direct confirmation from the firms, the exact reason for this specific Jump Crypto to Galaxy Digital transfer remains speculative, but the volume indicates a purposeful action. Galaxy Digital’s Growing Bitcoin Holdings: A Closer Look The report also shed light on Galaxy Digital’s current Institutional Bitcoin holdings. Following the accumulation of 1,001 BTC from Jump Crypto over three days, Galaxy Digital’s reported wallet now holds a total of 4,377 BTC. At the time of the report, this impressive holding was valued at approximately $462.37 million. This substantial holding underscores Galaxy Digital’s significant presence in the Bitcoin market. As a firm heavily involved in cryptocurrency investment management and financial services, maintaining a large reserve of BTC is likely integral to their business model, supporting trading operations, investment products, and potentially balance sheet holdings. Comparing the figures: Transaction/Holding Amount (BTC) Approximate Value (USD) Recent Transfer (Single) 501 $53 million Transferred over 3 Days (Total) 1,001 $105.32 million Galaxy Digital’s Reported Total Holding 4,377 $462.37 million These figures illustrate the scale at which institutional players like Galaxy Digital operate within the crypto trading and investment space. What Can We Learn from Institutional Crypto Trading Activity? Observing the movements of large players like Jump Crypto and Galaxy Digital offers valuable insights for anyone interested in the cryptocurrency market. While not direct trading signals, they highlight the increasing maturity and institutional adoption of digital assets. Key takeaways often include: Confirmation of active institutional participation. Indications of potential supply/demand dynamics forming off-exchange. Understanding the relationships and flow of assets between major market participants. Contextualizing market volatility – sometimes large moves are operational, not purely directional bets. Tracking wallets associated with known institutional players, like the one holding Galaxy Digital’s reported balance, is a common practice for analysts trying to gauge institutional sentiment and activity levels in Institutional Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies. Challenges and Considerations While tracking institutional flows is informative, it’s not without challenges. Wallet attribution isn’t always definitive, and the exact purpose of a transfer is rarely publicly disclosed. Furthermore, large players can execute complex strategies involving multiple wallets and entities, making it difficult to piece together the full picture from on-chain data alone. There are also considerations around market impact and transparency. Large OTC deals, while necessary for volume, can sometimes make price discovery on public exchanges less efficient in the short term. Regulatory scrutiny on large transfers and institutional activity is also an ongoing factor in the market. Conclusion: The Pulse of Institutional Crypto The recent substantial Bitcoin transfer from Jump Crypto to Galaxy Digital is more than just a transaction; it’s a snapshot of the dynamic and rapidly evolving institutional crypto landscape. It underscores the significant capital and assets being managed and moved by major financial players. With over $105 million in BTC transferred over three days and Galaxy Digital now holding a reported $462 million in Bitcoin in one wallet, the scale of operations among these firms is clear. Whether these transfers are for trading, custody, or other strategic reasons, they are a testament to the growing integration of Bitcoin and other digital assets into traditional finance structures and sophisticated crypto trading strategies. Keeping an eye on these large institutional movements remains a crucial way to understand the undercurrents shaping the cryptocurrency market and the increasing adoption of Institutional Bitcoin . To learn more about the latest Bitcoin market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping institutional adoption in the crypto trading space. This post Bitcoin: Jump Crypto Executes Massive $105M Transfer to Galaxy Digital first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: Altcoin Price Prediction 2025: Pi Network (PI) Plunges 80% Ahead of a Binance Debut, while XYZVerse Rockets Past $14M
body: Altcoin price predictions for 2025 currently present a varied outlook. On the one hand, Pi Network (PI) experienced a steep price collapse over the past few months, but the optimism is fanned by speculation of a potential Binance listing . While the Pi Core Team remains silent and Binance has made no formal announcement, blockchain sleuths have spotted significant test activity from a Binance-linked Stellar wallet on the Pi Chain. This has sparked a wave of rumors among the PI community. Meanwhile, XYZVerse is gaining traction with a viral presale and a sports-meets-meme coin narrative that’s pulling in millions. This article breaks down the outlook for both—one struggling to reclaim relevance, the other racing toward a high-profile launch. From $3 to $0.60: PI Price Crashes 80% Since peaking at nearly $3 in February 2025, Pi (PI) has plunged over 80%, now hovering just above $0.60. The sharp decline stems from several challenges: delays in mainnet migration, unmet milestones (with only ~8 million of 10 million required users having migrated), and waning public interest. Google search trends for Pi have hit yearly lows, and IOU-based PI trading volume has dropped 97% since mid-May. Bearish technical indicators have reinforced the downtrend. The Relative Strength Index (RSI) remains firmly in bearish territory, and many analysts expect a potential slide to $0.50 or even $0.40 if $0.60 fails to hold. Binance Listing Rumors Ignite a Price Rebound Amid the gloom, a beacon of bullish hope has emerged. Several crypto watchers on X (formerly Twitter) reported that a wallet associated with Binance had initiated test transactions on the Pi Chain. These observations coincide with an ecosystem update scheduled by Pi Network for May 14 — adding fuel to speculation that a listing on Binance could be imminent. In response to the rumors, PI’s price rebounded sharply, surging over 20% in just a few days and testing the $0.75 resistance level. This upward movement has renewed optimism that a breakout could be underway. What the Charts Say: Breakout or Breakdown? Technical analysts are watching the $0.75 level closely. If PI can decisively break above it, upside targets of $0.82 and $1.15 are within range, especially if news of a Binance debut materializes. A listing on Binance — one of the world's largest and most liquid crypto exchanges — could inject massive volume and credibility into the project. However, if the $0.75 barrier holds and the rumors prove unfounded, PI could slip back toward $0.60 or even lower. The extended lack of transparency from the Pi Core Team, combined with mounting token supply and delayed mainnet progression, makes this a high-risk zone. Pi Network Price Prediction 2025 Assuming a successful Binance listing and progress toward full mainnet migration, PI could reclaim its previous highs, potentially ranging between $1.20 to $1.80 in 2025. In a more conservative scenario, if delays continue and no major exchange listings are confirmed, a range of $0.40 to $0.65 seems more realistic. Source: TradingView That said, Pi Network remains a highly speculative asset. The ecosystem is still evolving, and its off-chain IOU status leaves room for uncertainty. Investors should weigh the potential rewards against the risks of an opaque project with limited market access — at least for now. XYZVerse Price Prediction: Can XYZ Become the Next Meme Coin Titan? As Pi Network captures the attention of cautious investors with rumors of a Binance debut, another contender is rapidly building momentum. XYZVerse is turning heads with a unique mix of sports adrenaline and meme-fueled virality. XYZVerse Raises Over $14M in Viral Presale XYZVerse ($XYZ) is a new meme coin phenomenon that’s blending the passion of sports with the power of community-driven crypto hype. The project has already raised over $14 million in its presale which they have recently announced on their X profile. This achievement speaks to the market’s appetite for meme coins with real cultural hooks. While countless meme tokens rise and fall on little more than fleeting trends, XYZVerse is built on a more robust foundation. Branded as the first all-sports meme coin, XYZ unites fans from football, MMA, and beyond, creating a cross-sport digital fanbase with massive potential. What Makes XYZ Different? Unlike typical meme coins, XYZ is not just about laughs and lingo — it’s about sustainable growth and community engagement. Here’s how: Revenue Mechanics: XYZVerse uses community-driven revenue to power regular buybacks and token burns, helping support price stability. Gamified Features: The roadmap includes play-to-earn mechanics, sports-themed minigames, and ecosystem utilities — all powered by $XYZ. New Character, New Identity: The recent website refresh introduced XYZepe, a bold mascot determined to take XYZ to the top of CoinMarketCap. In the often-hype-driven world of crypto, XYZVerse’s mix of entertainment, sports loyalty, and token utility offers a refreshing — and potentially explosive — combination. Presale Update: Nearly 95% of Stage 12 Sold Out The clock is ticking. With just five stages left before $XYZ hits the open market, savvy investors are rushing to secure tokens at deep discounts. Current Price: $0.003333 Next Stage Price: $0.005 Final Presale Price: $0.02 The numbers speak for themselves: momentum is building fast, and early supporters could see significant upside if the launch mirrors the success of other breakout meme coins. From the current price, the potential ROI stands at approximately 3000%. Join XYZVerse Presale for Potential 3000% ROI Earn While You Promote: Ambassador Airdrop Program XYZVerse is also rewarding its early backers through the Ambassador Airdrop Program, where fans can earn $XYZ by promoting the project creatively — from social media content to memes and more. This grassroots marketing initiative is helping spread the XYZ message like wildfire — and it’s paying off. Final Thoughts: A Meme Coin With Substance? Pi Network and XYZVerse reflect two sides of the altcoin market in 2025—one recovering from collapse, the other rising fast. Pi’s 80% drop shows what delayed execution and unclear communication can do. It’s still speculative. A Binance listing could lift it to $1.20–$1.80, but without that, it risks staying between $0.40–$0.65. XYZVerse, in contrast, is accelerating. With over $14 million raised and only a few presale stages left, its path is clear. Strong branding, a sports-driven angle, and smart tokenomics give it breakout potential. From its current price, the projected upside—up to 3000%—puts it firmly on the radar. Altcoin price prediction 2025 favors agility and narrative. Pi is waiting for confirmation. XYZ is already in motion. title: Ethereum privacy roadmap proposes EU GDPR-safe blockchain design
body: A new Ethereum privacy proposal suggests modular design and privacy tech can help the network align with EU GDPR rules while preserving decentralization.
